name: Melting Minds
description:
"How to run the game" and "Complete Gameplay"

Explore the Melting Paracosm with your variants to find the cause of the meltdown and stop it before it causes permanent loss. 

"Pay Close attention to the Dialogue"

Created in 3 days for the Genesis Game Jam on the theme "Meltdown"

Mechanics:

  • 2D platformer
  • Health and Points system
  • Dialogue System
  • Combat Mechanics
  • Different Enemy types
  • Lock and Key Mechanics
  • Checkpoint and Restart Mechanics

Requirements:

  •  OS Windows 7 and Above. 64 bit
  • Processor i3 (Minimum) or AMD Alternate
  • 4 GB RAM
  • 2 GB graphics
  • 124 MB Hard Drive Space
